attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
More and more petitions are being made to knight people who don't deserve it, ban things which help people and do other useless things which not many people generally care about.

We would like to see this stopped by removing the right people have to petition but instead people can do things the old way by writing in pen. This way people will only try and change things if they feel strongly enough about them to put some effort behind their ideas.

This idea has gained significant support on
http://www.facebook.com/
even if not all the people showing support there sign this petition

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
